item.title: Autonomic Computing Reloaded
item.description:
I always felt management in distributed systems could be solved removing as much human as possible. Back in 2010, while I was working as a researcher in Poznan University of Technology, I was researching a concept proposed by IBM called autonomic computing. What they did was take MAPE (Monitor-Analyze-Plan-Execute) loop and added knowledge component to it.
